item.title: Alabama's Football Dominance
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.5 v dplyr 1.0.3 ## v tidyr 1.1.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggrepel) ## Warning: package 'ggrepel' was built under R version 4.0.4 library(waffle) library(ggplot2) alabama <- read.csv("data/alabamafootball.csv") glimpse(alabama) ## Rows: 14 ## Columns: 5 ## $ Year <int> 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011,.

Nick Saban is easily the greatest college football coach of all time. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.5 v dplyr 1.0.3 ## v tidyr 1.1.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggrepel) ## Warning: package 'ggrepel' was built under R version 4.
